channel.title: Need Help with getting server to run please!
channel.description: okay guys first off please dont troll my thread and call me a freaking noob or something like that i have everything downloaded like no-ip,jdk 7 and my environmental Varrables set and everything but it seems like every server and client i try to download everytime i try to run them i always get an error or "path not specified or something" i open the .bat file and change the jdk to my version and what not but it still does not work are there any suggestions maybe on what im doing wrong?? any suggestions will be greatly appreciated!! thank you for your time!

Yes, if you have jdk update 7 like they say you do.

item.title: Need Help with getting server to run please!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

@echo off title InsidiaX "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

Try that, also if your PC isn’t x64 bit, remove the x86.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with getting server to run please!

item.title: Need Help with getting server to run please!
item.dc:creator: @fish_iz_ill fish iz ill
item.description:
@fish_iz_ill wrote:

@echo off
title InsidiaX
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

Classpath:CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
Path:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin;

If that helps you any

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with getting server to run please!

i have everything downloaded like no-ip,jdk 7 and my environmental Varrables set and everything

i open the .bat file and change the jdk to my version and what not but it still does not work are there any suggestions maybe on what im doing wrong?? any suggestions will be greatly appreciated!! thank you for your time!
